alert.note: Alert for Bell; Milam (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 20 at 5:52PM CDT until April 20 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN MILAM AND BELL COUNTIES... At 551 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Harker Heights to Belton to Seaton, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Killeen, Temple, Copperas Cove, Harker Heights, Belton, Fort Hood, Nolanville, Morgan`s Point Resort, Bartlett, Salado, Little River-Academy, Troy, Rogers, Holland, Kempner, Buckholts, Belton Lake, Stillhouse Hollow Lake, Sparks and Union Grove. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
